Name: Global Sources Ltd. (Bermuda)
Description: Global Sources Ltd. operates as a business-to-business media company that provides information and integrated marketing services in the People?s Republic of China, rest of Asia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. It operates through Exhibitions, Online and Other Media Services, and All Other segments. The company uses English-language media to facilitate trade from Greater China to the world, as well as offers sourcing information and export marketing services. It provides GlobalSources.com, an online marketplace that enables buyers to identify, shortlist, and make enquiries to suppliers; trade shows for the electronics, mobile electronics, gifts and home, and fashion sectors; advertising and marketing creative services; information to executives in Asia; and business seminars, as well as publishes various industry-specific trade magazines in print and digital formats. Global Sources Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is based in Hamilton, Bermuda.
